actors.name: resumePrompt
actors.text: You have completed part of this lesson.

actors.name: s3-bullet1a
actors.text: Include all parts of the grain

actors.name: s3-bullet2b
actors.text: More fiber, vitamins and minerals, and energy that lasts longer

actors.name: s3-bullet3c
actors.text: Examples include: whole grain breads or rolls, brown rice, oatmeal, and popcorn

actors.name: s3-bullet2
actors.text: Less fiber and fewer vitamins and minerals

actors.name: s3-bullet3
actors.text: Examples include white bread, white rice, anything made with white flour

actors.name: end-text
actors.text: Make half your grains whole grains.

actors.name: whole
actors.text: Choose low-fat or fat-free dairy products.

empty_replay_scene.description: since a scene change request to the current scene is ignored, first change to this empty scene
